name: Twitch.tv 720p layout
description:
[Rate and discuss!]
Resizes the video layout to 720p instead of 480p so you can view 720p in full resolution without the need of going fullscreen.

[15-06-2012] Also added support for the playback pages.
[24-06-2012] Added spacing to accommodate a channel-banner. Fixed z-index of the player.
